{{Actor| | type = Decoration | name = Ruined Aztec pillar | class = PillarAztecRuined | game = Strife | doomednum = 56 | convid = 213 }}[[Classes]]: PillarAztecRuined
A totally destroyed [[Classes:PillarAztec|Aztec pillar]], in even worse shape than the [[Classes:PillarAztecDamaged|damaged one]]. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR PillarAztecRuined { {{Property|Radius}} 16 {{Property|Height}} 40 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: STLE A -1 Stop } }
